response.content:
Dear [Name],

I hope this email finds you well! As we head into the busy holiday season, I wanted to take a moment to share with you some tips for starting an online business. 

If you're new to the world of online business, it can be daunting to know where to start. However, by following these tips, you can make your online business a success. 

Firstly, ensure that you have a great website. Your website should be visually appealing, easy to navigate, and optimized for search engines. Don't forget to have a strong call-to-action that guides your visitors towards your product or service.
